    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111995</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Loss of accommodation of the eye with age</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verlust der Anpassung des Auges mit Alter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perte de logement de l'oeil avec l'âge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perda da acomodação do olho com idade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perdita di sistemazione dell'occhio con l'età</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απώλεια στέγασης του ματιού με την ηλικία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pérdida de comodidad del ojo con edad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship of age and accommodation of the eye. The decrease in accommodation becomes dominant some time after the age of 40.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">accommodation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Age</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">old sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">presbyopia</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt das Verhältnis des 
Alters und Anpassung des Auges. Die Abnahme an der Anpassung 
wird einige Zeit nach dem Alter von 40 dominierend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre le rapport de l'âge 
et le logement de l'oeil. La diminution du logement devient 
dominante une certaine heure après l'âge de 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra o relacionamento da 
idade e a acomodação do olho. A diminuição na acomodação 
torna-se dominante alguma hora após a idade de 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra il rapporto 
dell'età e la sistemazione dell'occhio. La diminuzione nella 
sistemazione diventa dominante un certo tempo dopo l'età di 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
της ηλικίας και στέγαση του ματιού. Η μείωση στη στέγαση 
γίνεται κυρίαρχη κάποιος χρόνος μετά από την ηλικία 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra el lazo de la edad y
la comodidad del ojo. La disminución de la comodidad llega a 
ser dominante una cierta hora después de la edad de 40.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anpassung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
